TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreatingCookieEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将值提供给任何事件处理程序。 The class supplies values to any event handler. 通过使用此类的属性, 可以在创建自定义身份验证 cookie 时检索用户凭据。By using the properties of this class, you can retrieve user credentials when you create a custom authentication cookie. 在对用户凭据进行身份验证后,类会在设置身份验证cookie后引发事件。The class raises the event when it sets the authentication cookie, after the user credentials have been authenticated. 类构造一个对象并将其传递给任何事件处理程序。 The class constructs a object and passes it to any event handler. 通过 和属性检索用户凭据。You retrieve the user credentials through the , and properties. 属性可以包含要进行身份验证所需的任何自定义值, 如标识号。The property can contain any custom values that you need in order to authenticate, such as an identification number. 属性指示是否应在当前会话之后保留身份验证 cookie。The property indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained past the current session. 如果创建身份验证`true` cookie, 则将属性设置为,以便该类不创建 cookie。Set the property to `true` if you create the authentication cookie, so that the class does not create the cookie. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序从对象中检索用户值以自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 处理程序将属性中的值保存到身份验证票证中, 并将属性`true`设置为, 以指示已创建身份验证 cookie。The handler saves the value from the property in the authentication ticket and sets the property to `true` to indicate that the authentication cookie has been created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieIsSet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieIsSet : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已创建身份验证 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie has been created.

value.span: 如果已创建身份验证 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the authentication cookie was created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类检查属性, 以确定是否已创建身份验证 cookie。The class checks the property to determine whether the authentication cookie has been created. 如果在事件的事件`true`处理程序中创建了一个身份验证 cookie, 则将此值设置为。You set this value to `true` if you create an authentication cookie in an event handler for the event. 如果将设置为`false` (默认值), 则类将创建一个身份验证 cookie, 这将覆盖在事件的处理程序中创建的所有 cookie。If is set to `false` (the default value), the class creates an authentication cookie, This overwrites any cookie that you have created in the handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序从对象中检索用户值以自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 创建身份验证票证之后`true` , 属性设置为。The property is set to `true` after the authentication ticket is created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomCredential As String
public: property System::String ^ CustomCredential { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取用户提供的其他身份验证值。

span.span: Gets additional authentication values that are provided by the user.

value.span: 进行身份验证所需的除用户名和密码以外的其他自定义值。

span.span: The custom values required for authentication, other than user name and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可检索身份验证票证中的自定义值。You use the property to retrieve custom values in the authentication ticket. 属性包含传递给方法的值。 The property contains the value passed to the method. 通常, 此属性用于传递必须使用用户名和密码进行验证的自定义值, 如标识号。Typically, this property is used to pass custom values that must be validated with the user name and password, such as an identification number. 如果属性中存储了多个值, 则必须分析属性才能检索值。If more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the property in order to retrieve values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序从对象中检索用户值, 以便自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object in order to customize the authentication cookie. 在属性中传递的值存储在 forms 身份验证票证的属性中。The value passed in the property is stored in the property of the forms authentication ticket. > [!NOTE] > 仅当您知道属性中的数据不敏感时, 才将属性存储在cookie中。Store the property in a cookie only when you know that the data in the property is not sensitive. 恶意用户可以访问 cookie 中的值。Malicious users can access the values in the cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示超出当前会话时是否应保留身份验证 Cookie。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained beyond the current session.

value.span: 如果超出当前会话时应保留 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie should be retained beyond the current session; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建对象时, 可以使用属性来指定是否在当前会话之外保留身份验证 cookie。When you create a object, you can use the property to specify whether the authentication cookie is retained beyond the current session. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序从对象中检索用户值, 以便自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object in order to customize the authentication cookie. 对象的属性设置为属性中的值。The property of the object is set to the value in the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService.CreatingCookieEventArgs/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Password As String
public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the password for the user.

value.span: 用户提供的用于身份验证的密码。

span.span: The password that is provided by the user for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在身份验证票证中设置自定义值时, 可以使用属性来检索密码。You use the property to retrieve the password when you set custom values in the authentication ticket. > [!NOTE] > 不要将属性的值保存在身份验证票证中。Do not save the value of the property in the authentication ticket. 恶意用户可以访问 cookie 并检索密码, 即使 cookie 已加密也是如此。A malicious user can access the cookie and retrieve the password even though the cookie is encrypted.

span.span: Gets the name for the user.

value.span: 用户提供用于身份验证的名称。

span.span: The name that is provided by the user for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在身份验证票证中设置自定义值时, 可以使用属性来检索身份验证名称。You use the property to retrieve the authentication name when you set custom values in the authentication ticket. 通常, 将对象的属性设置为值。Typically, you set the property of the object to the value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 处理程序从对象中检索用户值以自定义身份验证 cookie。The handler retrieves user values from the object to customize the authentication cookie. 属性设置为属性的值。 The property is set to the values of the property.
